***
## accuracy{forecast}
- https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/forecast/forecast.pdf


***

```{r warning=T,error=T,message=T}
library(forecast)
```

### Examples cited from Reference manual/リファレンスマニュアルからの引用サンプル

```{r warning=T,error=T,message=T}
fit1 <- rwf(EuStockMarkets[1:200,1],h=100)
fit2 <- meanf(EuStockMarkets[1:200,1],h=100)
accuracy(fit1)
accuracy(fit2)
accuracy(fit1,EuStockMarkets[201:300,1])
accuracy(fit2,EuStockMarkets[201:300,1])
plot(fit1)
lines(EuStockMarkets[1:300,1])
```

***
### Supplement/補足

```{r warning=T,error=T,message=T}
nrow(EuStockMarkets)
head(EuStockMarkets)
tail(EuStockMarkets)
summary(fit1)
summary(fit2)
```
